title: **-- MASSIVE STUDIO EASILY CONV -- QUEEN BED FITS -- 24HR DOORMAN
posting_body: ['**-- CONVERTIBLE STUDIO TO 1 BEDROOM -- QUEEN BED FITS -- DOORMAN BUILDING -- HIGH CEILINGS--**', 'Listing ID #: 212953', 'Price: $3,199', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'Bedrooms: 1.0', 'Bathrooms: 1.0', 'Building Amenities', 'Bicycle Room', 'Diplomats OK', 'Doorman', 'Elevator', 'Health Club', 'Laundry', 'Lounge', 'Subway', 'Valet', 'Apartment Amenities', 'City View', 'Dishwasher', 'Granite Kitchen', 'Hardwood', 'High Ceilings', 'Marble Bath', 'Renovated', 'MASSIVE studio easily convertible to a 1 bed!', 'Amenities included!', '**Broker fee applies', 'Building amenities include: -Laundry on site -Fitness center -Valet Services -Roof deck -Resident Lounge', 'Located in the heart of the Financial District, this building is within walking distance to the South Street Seaport, Brookfield Place, and all major subway lines (1,2,3,A,C,E,Path train)', 'Contact Anthony today to book an appointment!', 'Call/text @ 917 721 3315 or Email:', '<URL>', 'Anthony Bernard', 'Phone: (212) 402-7855', 'Mobile: 9177213315', 'Fax: (212) 402-7856', 'Email: <URL>', 'The Bouklis Group \xa0 (212) 402-7855 \xa0 9177213315 \xa0 FAX (212) 402-7856 \xa0 <URL>', 'POSTED BY REALTYMX™', 'To view, call or text Anthony Bernard at 9177213315']
